item.title: By: Paul Walsh
item.dc:creator: Paul Walsh
item.description:
Manoj, I'm amazed! ;)
Microsoft are paying us to build an IE plugin so what does that tell you? I've never heard of anyone paying for an extension to be built before now.
This is the reason we went ugly early with the Firefox stuff. I've asked a friend at Opera to take the finger out or they'll be left behind :)
item.content:encoded:
Manoj, I’m amazed!

Microsoft are paying us to build an IE plugin so what does that tell you? I’ve never heard of anyone paying for an extension to be built before now.

This is the reason we went ugly early with the Firefox stuff. I’ve asked a friend at Opera to take the finger out or they’ll be left behind

item.title: By: Manoj Ranaweera
item.dc:creator: Manoj Ranaweera
item.description: Whilst I do love open source software, I am hooked to IE7. Is there Content Labels for MS IE7?
item.content:encoded: Whilst I do love open source software, I am hooked to IE7. Is there Content Labels for MS IE7?
